Message:
The little girl in the hole
pulled out a stuffed bear
and showed it to me.

“My mom gave me this bear!
It’s my treasure!”

As the little girl
beamed with pride,
my prince happily
gave her a nod, saying,

“And that treasure is
the only one of its kind
in the whole wide world.”

So, if it’s a gift from
someone precious,

even an ordinary stuffed doll
can become a precious treasure...

...Hehe, I see!
A gift doesn’t have to be “special.”

As long as someone puts
their heart into a gift,
anything can become a treasure...

Even I would be happy with
anything that you handpicked
for me, my prince.

Heh-hehehe...!
There’s only three days
left before the Holy Night.
I have no time to waste.
